title: Trying to friend an IRL friend of mine...
body: For the past few days, I've been trying to friend someone I know, his summoner name is ChisisMdness which apparently doesn't exist. He keeps on telling me yes he does play league, and Isn't tricking me. I checked on op.gg aswell on all regions and his name doesn't show up anywhere, so I'm very confused especially since he tries to friend me aswell and it says I don't exist.

replies.body:
I did a search on my end for anyone with the Summoner Name ChisisMdness and wasn't able to find anything either! So good news, it's not an error on your end. 

My best guess is that your friend possibly got his Summoner Name and Username switched up. It could be that the name he gave you is actually his Username, which you won't be able to use to add him. Have your friend double check his in-game Summoner name to make sure he gave you the right name.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Fmum4YJ2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-27T01:39:31.119+0000)
>
> I did a search on my end for anyone with the Summoner Name ChisisMdness and wasn't able to find anything either! So good news, it's not an error on your end. 
> 
> My best guess is that your friend possibly got his Summoner Name and Username switched up. It could be that the name he gave you is actually his Username, which you won't be able to use to add him. Have your friend double check his in-game Summoner name to make sure he gave you the right name.

He may also not be able to friend you because of the ø in your name.

> [{quoted}](name=Mxepc Sentrik,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Fmum4YJ2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-27T03:35:33.760+0000)
>
> He may also not be able to friend you because of the ø in your name.

It's not that for certain. I memorized the alt code for the ø, but thanks anyways! (alt 0248)

> [{quoted}](name=Hydrø,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Fmum4YJ2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-27T04:08:02.570+0000)
>
> It's not that for certain. I memorized the alt code for the ø, but thanks anyways! (alt 0248)

Alright, I tried at least :P
